name: adc_ltm_profile_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()


def getLTMProfileList():
    '''
    to get the list of LTM profile

    '''

    ltm_profile_list = []
    adc_ltm_profile_list = connect_db.appviewx.lpr.find()
    for device in adc_ltm_profile_list:
        ltm_profile_list.append(device)
    return ltm_profile_list
description: To get a list of LTM profile
_keywords: To get a list of LTM profile
